subdivision_of_building: Ground floor rear single story extension.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Design & Access & Planning Statement; Flood Risk Assessment; Title Plan; Site Location Plan; 547/00A; 04A; 05A.

Condition : 3 - Matching Materials - The facing materials used in the development hereby permitted shall match those of the existing building in materials, style, colour, texture and, in the case of brickwork, bonding, coursing and pointing.

Condition : 4 - INFORMATIVE
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The applicant/agent was provided with pre-application advice.
   ii) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   iii) The application was approved without delay.
   iv) The application was considered by the Planning Committee where the applicant/agent had the opportunity to speak to the committee and promote the application.

Condition : 5 - The Council as local planning authority, recognizes the importance of achieving high standards of site practice and workmanship in the course of construction and acknowledges that this will have significant influence upon the quality of the finished brickwork.

The applicant is therefore encouraged to follow the advice set out in the Brick Development Association publication: Good-Site-Practice-Workmanship-General-Guide-2023 when implementing the development hereby approved.

Condition : 6 - Building Regulations 
Please note that this is a planning permission only and you may also require approval under the Building Regulations. If you are in any doubt about this you can get further information via https://www.merton.gov.uk/planning-and-buildings/building-control  or by emailing building.control@merton.gov.uk.
description: ERECTION OF A SINGLE-STOREY REAR EXTENSION.
